examples:
Refund request reason: I started the free trial of Canva pro in December 2020.  I cancelled it at the beginning of January 2021, but while going thought my bank account I saw that Canva had withdrawn $155.88. I was very surprised due to the fact that I definitely cancelled the subscription. I am upset that I never received a notification or email that gave warning before I "paid" for the years subscription. I would like to get a refund. Even if I have to pay for the subscription for the month of January, but can get the rest of the money back would be fine.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: Hello, I took out a Canva subscription on 01/29/2021. However, I would like to use it for my work in the association and now we have received a free account from you (thank you for this great opportunity). Therefore, I no longer need the subscription that was signed on January 29th, 2021 and ask for cancellation. The invoice number is <NUMBER>I didn't just want to post the money back. Kind regards <NAME>

What is your problem related to ?: Other Describe the problem .: Good afternoon! My subscription to this Canva app was active until 1/31/21! I canceled my subscription on January 30, 2021 at 10:54, after which I received a notification that on the night of 01/29/21 the money for the subscription was withdrawn !!!!! I would like to submit a request for a refund of these funds, because for the period before 01/31/2021 the program has already been paid for !!!! I do not plan to use the program further !!!! I look forward to your feedback!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: It said I had until January 13, 2021 to cancel my CanvaPro subscription. It charged my account in January 12, 2021. I was about to cancel - as I had my timer set. Due to COVID, I need the money more than a subscription at this moment. I hope I am able to get back on the subscription soon, but as for right now, I simply cannot afford it. I would like a refund please. 
Thank you.

Refund request reason: Till January I can’t use my canva pro. It supposed to renew on September 2021. I need to solve the problem or my money back

Describe your issue: I did not request the 1 month option and cancelled this in January. I have been charged for a service in December in January which I did not opt in to. I have been charged for a service I have not used which you can see from your records. For this reason I would like a refund please
Thank you
<NAME>

I didn't even used Canva these past days. I cancelled the subscription today Jan 12,2021, pls refund because it means I wont be able to use the subscription that was charged to my bank account.

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: We wrote off the money for a paid subscription, which was supposedly issued on December 25th, this is the beginning of the term, I did not issue any subscription because it was not needed. For some unknown reason, the money was debited on January 9th. But the period is spelled out from December 25 to January 25. Google account also does not have this subscription. I ask for a refund.

What do you need help with?: I did not know I was going to be billed for canva. I would like a refund from January as this was no clear to me. I also did not use Canva in January to further prove my point. thank you

What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I request a refund for a charge made on the day of the date (January 22) from your Canva app. The subscription for which the payment was made was suspended on January 15 as I was informed by email. At the time, you requested a free trial, but since the payment was not made on the day indicated by your policy, you had to cancel at the same time. For this reason, he requested a refund for the charge made to my 3003 Visa card, since it was not authorized by me. I repeat the subscription was unsubscribed previously. I await your comments as soon as possible to send you bank details to make the refund. Thank you very much

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have cancelled my free Canva Pro subscription last January 14, 2021. However, I was still charged with Php 649 this January 17, 2021. Please refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I canceled my subscription after my October 2020 payment and then all of sudden out of nowhere I was charged again on February 3, 2021. If you look at my records you will see there is no payment for November, December or January. It is very concerning to me that your company is trying to steal money from me by starting up my subscription again without permission! I want my money back immediately and may report Canva to whomever regulates companies like you! This is unacceptable!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was going to cancel my canva trial subscription, but it renewed on January 4th at 10:17 pm, when it said it was going to renew on Jan 5th. Can you please provide a refund? Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there,
I canceled my subscription on December 21, 2020, but was charged on December 22, 2020. I don't know why the charge went through after I canceled my subscription. I would greatly appreciate a refund. Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: This account was supposed to be cancelled in January. I have not used Canva in 2021 at all. PLEASE refund my money.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, 

I haven’t been using canva recently. I was on the free trial and I was supposed to be charged on my card for the subscription on January 14, 2021. However, today in California it’s January 13, 2021 and I got charged $119.00 before the date of January 14,2021. I didn’t plan on staying with Canva and I wanted to cancel the subscription before I got charged the $119.00.  I would like a full refund on the order because I got charged one day before as an error and I planned on canceling today before January 14,2021. I hope to hear from you soon. I would like a full refund. I’m very disappointed I got charged one day before when the trial didn’t end until tomorrow and I didn’t plan on using Canva, nor have I been using it recently. I haven’t been using any of the resources on it. I hope I can get my full refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I am sending in another request for a full refund because I want to make sure that it’s understood that I would like a full refund on the subscription. 

I was supposed to be charged on January 14, 2021 however I was charged on January 13, 2021. I’ve been on the free trial and I planned on canceling before I got charged. However for some reason I got charged one day before I was able to cancel the subscription and now I have lost $119 for a subscription that I didn’t plan on using or keeping. I’m very disappointed that I was charged before the date mentioned on the subscription page. 
I didn’t plan on staying with canva and I didn’t plan on using any of the benefits along with it. I hope I can receive a full refund on this. Thank you.

Refund request reason: Hi, I was charged a yearly subscription on January 14, 2021. I was under the impression that I was still in the trial period. I have cancelled my membership the same day. Please refund me the money. I have already sent in a request #JPT-<NUMBER>g2nc - without getting an answer. I am looking forward to hearing from you. Best regards, <NAME>

Refund request reason: GOOD MORNING - I SENT THE EMAIL BELOW ON JANUARY 1ST TO CANCEL THIS SUBSCRIPTION.  I HAVE NOW BEEN BILLED TWO TIMES INCORRECTLY: <NUMBER>AND <NUMBER>both for $12.95.  I'm requesting that these charges be refunded and the Pro subscription be cancelled.  Thank you!

<NAME> Risse <EMAIL>
Jan 1, 2021, 12:11 PM

to Canva

Good morning,

I have enjoyed Canva for the past 30 days and have created some great material.  I tried the PRO for a trial period which ended today.  I just went in to cancel the PRO subscription as I'm able to create what I need using your free material and see that I was charged today.  

I'm respectfully asking for this charge to be reversed.  I thank you in advance for making this happen.

p.s.  As I begin to release my videos I will certainly reference Canva as my tool for creating material.

Descreva o problema: Hello!
This the second atempt to contact service due to renewal prior renew date.
It was said that my signature would be renwed on 31/01/2021 but it was on 30/01/2021.
The Canva service is no longer need on my job because they will no longer refound me for it.

Yesterday 02/02/2021 I formalized a request thruought this channel but nothing happened, not even a confirmation email of the request.
I need help to sonve this metter, can someone help me?!
Thank you very much for your time and attention.
<NAME>.
